title: Social Arithmetic Learning Process Design Based on Islamic Financial Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Enhancing competency in analyzing Islamic finance case studies and solving arithmetic problems through VR simulations in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can apply arithmetic calculation principles of Islamic financial transaction types (Murabaha, Ijara, etc.) with 85% accuracy.
Learners can complete a project solving budget allocation problems in a simulated Islamic finance environment.
Learners evaluate the ability to determine Sharia (Islamic law) compliance in financial decisions through mathematical analysis.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
